A pyA#yatAM dhruqvA GRuqtEna# yaqj~jaM ~Mya#j~jaqM prati# dEvaqyadBya#H | 
sUqryAyAq UdhO&di#tyA uqpastha# uqrudhA#rA pRuthiqvI yaqj~jE aqsminn || 
praqjApa#tE rviqBAnnAma# lOqkastasmi(gg)#stvA dadhAmi saqha yaja#mAnEnaq sada#siq sanmE# BUyAqH sarva#masiq sarva#M mE BUyAH pUqrNama#si pUqrNaM mE# BUyAq akShi#tamasiq mA mE$ kShEShThAqH prAcyA$M diqSi dEqvA RuqtvijO# 
mArjayantAqM dakShi#NAyAM - [  ] 15
